mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mst_users ORDER BY id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mst_users (user_name, email, password, is_active, is_delete, group_role) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{isActive}, #{isDelete}, #{groupRole});
mapper.update: UPDATE mst_users SET user_name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, is_active = #{isActive}, group_role = #{groupRole} WHERE id = #{id};
